column4: anyone here had trouble with the intel video chipset and new xorg intel driver???
no, pclos, but im asking here because afaik its a cross distro problem. what do you know? i cant get video on my inspiron 1100 working on any newish livecd
its very much a per distro problem. We can't help here.
so does it work ok with gutsy?
well im skeptical but ill give it a go
you can use the ubuntu desktop cd as a live session to test it, without changing your harddrive
ok sure, we are talking about the xorg driver one and not the official intel one right?
because ive never seen that working, with pclos or mandriva or fedora or elive
what machine are you using them with out of interest - did you used to use the bios hack for video mem before this driver came out?
ok thanks ill certainly give it a go, and if it works, you just won a pclos to ubuntu machine convert ;)
